Package jrtr.swrenderer

Class SWRenderPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.swrenderer.SWRenderPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenderPanel
    public abstract class SWRenderPanel
extends java.lang.Object
implements RenderPanel
    Implements a panel for a software renderer. It uses a SWJPanelto display a bitmap rendered by the software renderer (SWRenderContext). This class and the class SWRenderContext are used in project 3.

    The user needs to extend this class and provide an implementation for the init call-back function. To use the software renderer instead of the OpenGL renderer in your application, you will simply derive your render panel from SWRenderPanel instead of GLRenderPanel.

    • Method Detail

      • getCanvas

        public javax.swing.JPanel getCanvas()
        Return the AWT component that contains the rendered image. The user application needs to call this. The returned component is usually added to an application window.

        public abstract void init​(RenderContext renderContext)
